description:
If you have a product line that you'd like to get more publicity for, then this video-based PR course is for you! In Publicity Jumpstart you'll learn what you need to be media-ready, how to design your press kit, how to set up your publicity plan and how to pitch your products to magazines, influential blogs, TV shows and even celebrities!

When you complete this course, you'll feel more confident when it comes to getting publicity for your products and you'll have a step-by-step roadmap to publicity success! You'll even get word-by-word scripts so you know what to say when you reach out to magazine editors, downloadable worksheets and PR plans and more.

You'll also learn how to leverage your media mentions into even more sales!
title: Publicity Jumpstart - How to Get PR for Your Product Line
